about_the_game:
You are a voluntary participant in an experiment to transfer a person's life into his own subconscious.
All you have to do is pass a few tests, after which you'll be rewarded, and at the same time you'll help create a real future project.
Your memory is disabled, but that's not a problem. Everything will go smoothly if you follow the instructions.
After all, you are in the halls of your mind, getting lost here would be a fatal mistake.

  • Why did you become a member?
  • Where did these strange visions come from?
  • What is that strange door in the corner?
  • Is it possible to erase a person's memory?
.
The empty room is overflowing

The whiteness is multicoloured

Darkness lights the way.


It is a visual novel with choices, different endings and mini-games.
Contains small doses of graphomania, philosophy, and other obscenities.
This is a visual novel with choices, different endings, and mini-games.
It contains small doses of graphomancy, philosophy, and other obscenities.

  • 10+ hours of gameplay(if you're on the menu for nine hours)
  • Bright and colourful visual style, while not losing its identity
  • Unconventional plot
  • Specially written author's soundtrack
.

The game creates a large space for modifications and contains an inbuilt mod editor, allowing you to create your own stories with simple blocks and easily put them in the workshop! The story is set up in such a way that mods are a major component of the game.
And White Room also has a neural net assistant who can help with writing!
detailed_description:
You are a voluntary participant in an experiment to transfer a person's life into his own subconscious.
All you have to do is pass a few tests, after which you'll be rewarded, and at the same time you'll help create a real future project.
Your memory is disabled, but that's not a problem. Everything will go smoothly if you follow the instructions.
After all, you are in the halls of your mind, getting lost here would be a fatal mistake.

  • Why did you become a member?
  • Where did these strange visions come from?
  • What is that strange door in the corner?
  • Is it possible to erase a person's memory?

name: White Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 2350M
  • Graphics: Geforce gtx 560
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3400
  • Graphics: Geforce gtx 750 ti

short_description: White room. White light. A white table. And only white intentions. A story that always ends before it begins. But one day the circle will be broken. All you have to do is realise...
